Reviews.Title: Awesome Phone
Reviews.Author: Dr :D
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome phone!  I did a lot or research before buying this phone, it was shipped and arrived on time and worked perfect right out of the box.  I bought this phone because it was unlocked and had a 1 yr warranty, I live in Asia.  I was looking at more expensive phones like the iphone4, Samsung Galaxy, Moto Droid but this phone had all the features but a much lower price.  The only bad points I found in all the reviews was the quality of the screen, speed of the processor and short battery life.  The screen is good enough, the processor is fast enough and yes the battery life is short 2-3 days but it depends how hard you use it.  I found that turning it off at night gives me a extra day.  The phone is easy to use and set up, the touch keys work great, gmail was a breeze, camera is good enough at 5 megapix and with flash too, love all the app's and apple like features.  The GPS was just Ok but the problem in Thailand is the poor coverage by Google, not the phone!  The owners manuel is online because it's 188 pages and you'll need to keep that pdf file handy to learn all the great features this phone has.  It's my first HTC and I am impressed.  This is a great phone with all the bells and whistles of the more expensive phones, well worth the price! Oh and one more thing, you'll love the flashlight feature.Update Nov 2011: Over One Year Later and I still love this phone, works perfect!!!Update Jan 2013: Over two years and yep, still a great phone works perfect,...

Reviews.Title: Great Phone, Internet wont work
Reviews.Author: Jessa L. Dolan "Jessa"
Reviews.Content: Like others, I did a lot of research about this phone before purchasing. At first, I didnt want to spend over $200 on a phone but when it came down to it, this phone is worth all the money and then some. I have never owned a smart phone before, so getting use to it took some time...But after a few days of fiddling with it, I figured it out pretty easily. The phone worked great out of the box, all I had to do was insert my sim card and it worked. However, when I went to add internet service to the phone, it did not work, after talking to T-mobile 3 times, they instructed me to call HTC to try and figure out the problem, HTC said when they unlocked the phone, they disabled the internet capability and that I would need to take it to a repair shop and have them lock it to T-mobile. I decided not to spend my time or money locking my phone hoping the internet would work, so I took the web plan off my account. The wi-fi works well enough for me, but I could see this to be a problem for others. I love the phone enough not to care. One main reason I bought the phone was the 5mp camera, which works awesome, the screen looks great to me and have no problem with the battery, I love the standard headphone jack because I use the phone as an mp3 player in my car, the speaker works great, no need for a bluetooth. I wasnt too thrilled with the keyboard but I downloaded a slide it keyboard and it works great. All in all, I am very happy with my phone, except for the whole internet problem.T-Mobile, USAPros:camerascreenandroidstandard headphone jackeasy to navigateWIFIUSB cordCons:problem with it being unlocked (no internet capability)information received in box was not in EnglishCharger is Europe prongs (came with an adapter) buy an extra us version on amazon....

Reviews.Title: Awesome smartphone
Reviews.Author: Eduardo J. Bracho M.
Reviews.Content: Awesome smartphone!!! really smart!!! Light, easy to use, great applications. ¿Cons? Battery runs out very fast so it's a good idea to buy additional power plugs for the car/home/computers, so you can charge it wherever you are...Sept.19,2013 UPDATEVery little internal memory. If you are like me, you will want to make intensive use of the phone and memory will run out soon.

Reviews.Title: HTC Wildfire A33333 Very Much Satisfied
Reviews.Author: castilr
Reviews.Content: I must say that I was surprised to have received the product in such short time and to have the product in such excellent condition. This is a new product but it was unlocked for international use. I used it overseas and it worked great. My only issue is the HTC Sync application does not work well with it.But it is truly a smart phone, with the applications and widgets available to you make you feel prepared for anything. This is my first touch screen phone but I 'm definitely getting used to it.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: LalC
Reviews.Content: I got this for my brother and it works great. He was able to use it with the service provider in India

Reviews.Title: worth the money!
Reviews.Author: kindle01
Reviews.Content: amazing gadget,not only is it a great cell phone you could just use it as a tablet too.So all the other people who said it isnt worth the money i totally disagree.

Reviews.Title: Nice Product
Reviews.Author: WaukePrab
Reviews.Content: Good quality 5MP camera. OK for video!!! Touch screen sensitivity is good. Battery lifetime is 50..50(have to charge every almost every nights).But .... overall it's a good cell phone for the price.

Reviews.Title: HTC + Android = WIN
Reviews.Author: Arphy
Reviews.Content: A light-weight handset giving you all the goodness of android for a fraction of the price. While not as powerful as more high end devices it still out performs any hand set in its class. As for Wireless Everything's service? 10 points guys, quick, efficient and not a problem in sight. All smiles.

Reviews.Title: HTC Wildfire
Reviews.Author: Review
Reviews.Content: Amazing Product. This is my first smartphone and I'm really enjoying it. It is working properly with my network provider in Colombia.Two things I don't like: Skype doesn't work for calls (at least not for me) and many YouTube videos can't be executed (I think is because of the screen resolution)The delivery was on time. Nice seller.

Reviews.Title: not for u.s.a
Reviews.Author: taurus
Reviews.Content: it doesn't work on USA 3G network, any way is a nice phone for the price, i gave to someone else to be used in another country

Reviews.Title: Cool android phone
Reviews.Author: Saravana
Reviews.Content: I bought this a month before and i like this very much. It has a cool navigation system which could be used as a GPS device except that the app is not switching between the landscape and portrait view.

Reviews.Title: very nice product
Reviews.Author: Ernesto Luis Trujillo Diaz
Reviews.Content: this smartphone is a good choice for those who dont want spend a lot of money and it's a very good device, works fine for me, camara is good, response of apps is good too. im very happy with this, i wont go with a large tecnical description. im a software engineer and i can tell you, the quality of the device is a little higher than the price you will paid.

Reviews.Title: Misleading sellers!!!
Reviews.Author: Duisgruntled
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone in March and by June it became problematic until it wouldn't turn on. Contacted the sellers who claimed that my 30 day warranty was up. I was not concerned with any 30 warranty as the phone came with a 1 year warranty. Been trying to get them to explain this but my efforts have been futile. This phone isn't what it is advertised as and you shouldn't allow yourself to be robbed!!

Reviews.Title: IMEI locked
Reviews.Author: rp
Reviews.Content: Just received it, tried a ATT prepaid SIM on it, and it says IMEI locked.I will update this review if I get it working.

Reviews.Title: Ok Phone
Reviews.Author: Gabi445 "Gabi"
Reviews.Content: Good features, but until this moment it's been impossible to connect to the internet using the data plan. Only can connect using wifi.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly for about 3 years
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: This phone works perfectly for about 3 years of continuious use until internal memory start to send message of low space due app updates as whatsapp, skype, facebook. Very good quality but low internal memory.

Reviews.Title: wouldn't charge in less than a year
Reviews.Author: nicevill "~nice"
Reviews.Content: This phone is small and slow.  Within less than a year of minimal use, this phone wouldn't charge at all.  Note: the phone didn't get wet at all.  The charger still works but the phone's circuitry or internal board is bad.  I have a couple other HTC's (Nexus One and Incredible S), which I bought before this and both are still pretty much alive.

Reviews.Title: Think twice before buying
Reviews.Author: Iulia
Reviews.Content: I got one of this phones around 6 month ago. I like how this phone looks, but now I hate by the way it works. This phone mega slow and it's  not comfortable for texting. The Internet and apps often not working. I feel like I just waste my money because now I have to look for something else.

Reviews.Title: Great Budget Phone
Reviews.Author: Gabriel K. Essel
Reviews.Content: Item came on time and that was impressive. packaging was superb. Upon opening the box everything was in. However the phone wasnt turning on so we decided to charge with the assumption that the battery has run down. Yet upon charging,there is still no indicator it is even charging and the phone still doesnt turn on. In summary I HAVE SCHEDULED A RETURN. Waiting for UPS Driver to pick up from my Aunties home as stated by Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: boyd a. bolte
Reviews.Content: Very simple phone, that is priced right, in the unlocked phone market.  HTC is as good as it gets for the price.

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: chocolatathunder
Reviews.Content: but for the money i think i could of done better at times i had to restart the phone to get it to work

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: jay ian
Reviews.Content: HTC Wildfire A3333 GSM Smartphone Unlocked with Android OS, 5 MP Camera and Wi-Fi - Unlocked Phone - International Version - Mochathe phone works well and hall all things promised except one thing the 2gb memory card according to the advertisement..so how and what are you going to do about this  i consider it wrong to lie to a customer....

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Veremili
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to use it overseas. Love how easy and friendly user it is. Every app runs perfectly and I love the fact that it is an android phone and it is not THAT BIG! I don't have any problems with my battery as a matter of fact it lasts up to 2 days, and the app called Portable Wi-Fi Hotspot lets me connect up to 6 diferent devices, which is really cool... RECOMEND IT 100%.

Reviews.Title: rogeda
Reviews.Author: rogeda
Reviews.Content: Very good quality 5MP camera. Not so good for video!!! Excelent touch screen sensitivity. Poor battery lifetime (have to charge every two days, sometimes at the same day!!). But it's a very good cell phone for the price.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone for the price.
Reviews.Author: juAn4la10k
Reviews.Content: If i do not give this article 5 stars it is just because the lack of support for 3G I did not see when i bought it, but for the price this is an outstanding phone. Best phone I had so far. God Job HTC

Reviews.Title: bAD phone
Reviews.Author: davern
Reviews.Content: SCREEN DIED AFTER 4 MONTHS .. LOST ALL CONTACTS  CRAPPY CUSTOMER SERVICE FROM HTC States ... Got stung by Customs for an extra $40

Reviews.Title: Good cost/benefits ratio
Reviews.Author: Amadeu
Reviews.Content: HTC has a great design and its Android integration is maybe the best. This mobile has a good price. The worst thing is its screen resolution, but the HTC Wildfire S will improve it in this point.I'm happy with my acquisition. :)

Reviews.Title: Save your money, buy a newer phone
Reviews.Author: Y.A.
Reviews.Content: The phone is slow, it's hardware is old and it can't support all the apps in the android market, even after I upgraded the OS. The touch screen is very slow, and it makes texting a nightmare.If you're already going to spend this much money on a phone, then you might as well spend a little bit more and get a high quality and newer phone.

Reviews.Title: Feedback
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed with the product. The battery dies very quickly. I never have service. Also  messages and phone are received hours after the fact. I hate this phone overall.

Reviews.Title: HTC has to make a more resistant screen
Reviews.Author: vitor
Reviews.Content: Positive points: easy to use, good price, arrived in the programmed time.Negative points: not good to play games with movements, not good to speak using Skype, the glass of touchscreen broke on the first fall, the telephone is very fragile.

Reviews.Title: Go, no problems.
Reviews.Author: orlando
Reviews.Content: htc wildfire a3333 unlocked excelente teléfono 3g, gps, 3.2 lcd con g sensor lo cual te deja rotar el teléfono , 5mp cámara, procesador 528 MHz bastante rápido, memoria externa asta 32 gb, android tal come se describe no problemas,navegación gratis en cualquier parte el mundo sin tener que esta conectado al Internet usando el mapa droid el cual es gratis en el market, wifi, soporta voice con google lo cual puedes hablar sin tener escribir textos en el buscador, muchas aplicaciones las puedes mover al mini sd card así hay mas espacio en la memoria del teléfono lo e comparado con otros teléfonos que tienen mis amigos come el iphone, galaxy, blackbery, sony xperia ect y es muy parecido y asta mejor ya  es desbloqueado.Good looks, great size Your life now fits conveniently in your pocket.HTC Sense(tm)Your incoming emails, texts, Facebook® messages and tweets are organized by the people you get them from. You can even add widgets like weather, stocks and news, so it feels like your phone was made just for you.Friend Stream You see your friends' Twitter(tm), Facebook and Flickr® updates all in one easy place. Plus you can post directly to Facebook, Twitter, or both.Android (tm) with Google(tm) everythingYou're never without directions, answers or videos of piano-playing cats with Google Maps(tm), Google Search(tm), Google Talk(tm) and YouTube(tm).Dimensions/weight (LxWxT) 116.85 x 61 x 11.99 mm (4.6 x 2.4 x0.47 inches)115 grams (4.056 ounces) with batteryNetworks Dual-band (800 and 1900 MHz) CDMA2000Operating System Android(tm) 2.1 with HTC SenseTMDisplay 3.2-inch touch-sensitive screen with 240 x 320 QVGA resolutionCamera 5 megapixel color camera with auto focus and flashInternal Memory ROM: 512 MB RAM: 384 MBBluetooth® 2.1GPS Internal GPS antennaBattery Rechargeable Lithium-ion batteryCapacity: 1300 mAhChipset 528 MHz

Reviews.Title: HTC wildfire
Reviews.Author: Arun
Reviews.Content: Good thing is looks of the phone is good (depend person to person view). Looking for basic Smartphone on Andriod? then it would meet the purpose.Issue i had with this phone is  bootup time is very high, screen resolution is average, when opening any application it very slow (example angree bride to open I felt it take ages before I play), noticed Call dropsSo I was not very happy the phone overall..

Reviews.Title: Extremely slow
Reviews.Author: Nadya
Reviews.Content: I like how the phone looks, the size. But, it works super SLOW! Not comfortable for texting and SLOW again. My old samsung was more convenient that's for sure. If you can afford buying smth more expensive - do it, this phone just drives me crazy sometimes!

Reviews.Title: Gracias
Reviews.Author: Ruben Vegas "rvegas81"
Reviews.Content: Aunque, el casillero que utilice para que me lo enviaran a Venezuela me perdió el paquete donde venia el producto les doy 5 estrellas porque aun así confió plenamente en los vendedores de Amazon

Reviews.Title: HTC WILDFIRE
Reviews.Author: mbayala
Reviews.Content: "Excellent excellent product. IT ARRIVED 7 DAYS BEFORE THE EXPECTED DAY. I ordered the product the 5th and it arrived the 7th (just in two days) super surprise. :) thanks. The only thing is that I thought the phone was brown and is grey. I dont like the color grey. I am dissapointed about that because I went by the picture posted on amazon. :("

Reviews.Title: Mediocre at best
Reviews.Author: Bart Van Belle
Reviews.Content: My wife bought this one as she was shopping for a family plan. $200-ish on T-mobile. I must divulge I had an iPhone 3G before, which may affect my rating.Out of the box I think this phone looks and feels good and has a nice (small) size. The touch screen works well. It has a reasonable battery life, although I have been running low on battery most afternoons. The phone comes with about 2 Gigs of memory, which is waaayyy not enough. How come a $200 phone comes with only this much memory? The camera is OK, but only with good light. The flash is pathetic and can't do more than about 2 feet.Much of the next part of the review really is about Droid than the phone.I was surprised that the phone does not sync with my iMac. I had to download apps to do that and the whole process was a bit of a battle. I then left my phone to sync with my computer overnight and found in the morning that the battery was dead. It didn't charge on the USB port, which I still think is odd. The power cord is hard to get in and the phone is so small you end up switching it on and entering data on the touchscreen unintentionally. And why does it turn itself on while charging and not turn off or screen save after a little while?I do NOT like the interface at all. I am constantly cursing at the screen as the interface just is not intuitive. It took me several days to figure out how everything works, since settings menus are all over the place. The visual voicemail from T-mobile is useless, as voicemails either never make it to this app or several hours later. Typing is OK. I use Swype, which I think is a really elegant input method.Some of the interface badness is:Add an event in the calendar and you don't see the time/date for the event, as the keyboard covers most of the screen. You can scroll the screen down, but it's awkward. I usually dismiss the keyboard so I can see the entire entry screen. You can't do special repetitions for events, just daily, weekday, weekly, monthly or yearly. You can't copy events either, so if you need an event every Mon, Wed, Fri for instance you have to create 3 separate ones.Searching for a contact is only by name. So if I only remember the company name I'm stuck.I seem to be entering or swyping the wrong words all the time, much more than I was used to on my iPhone. I now very carefully have to check my typing.Most of the time the weather info is not available, even though I have good reception, 3G and wifi.The news app never displays news, only stuff from weeks ago, never mind the settings.The only contacts that sync with Google are the ones that I put in myself, not any of the ones I imported by syncing my Mac. Why?There's more, but you get the gist. 5 years ago this phone would have been cool, now it's just clunky. For $200 there is a phone out there that actually works out of the box. It's called the iPhone and I'm getting one soon.
